## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G12130](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G12130)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AtC3H36, AtKH13, KHZ1</u>
- **Gene Name:** 
- **Description:**   KH domain-containing protein / zinc finger (CCCH type) family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2099292
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
